document.title: The Gender Wage Gap and Pay Equity: Is Comparable Worth the Next Step?

subject-areas.subject-area: key workplace documents, federal, Catherwood, ILR,

document.abstract: This report examines the trend in the male-female wage gap and the explanations offered for its existence. Remedies proposed for the gender wage gap’s amelioration are addressed, with an in-depth focus on the comparable worth approach to achieving “pay equity” or “fair pay” between women and men.
